tagline: Fast, Reliable Plumbing When You Need It Most
description: Serving the Austin area for over 20 years. From emergency repairs to full system installs, we get it done right the first time.
footerTagline: Honest work. Fair prices. Every time.

services.name: Emergency Repairs
services.description: 24/7 emergency response for burst pipes, flooding, and critical failures. We're there when it counts.

services.name: Drain Cleaning
services.description: Professional hydro-jetting and snaking to clear even the toughest blockages quickly.

services.name: Water Heater Service
services.description: Installation, repair, and replacement of tank and tankless water heaters. All brands serviced.

services.name: Pipe Repair & Repiping
services.description: Leak detection, pipe repair, and full repiping for homes and commercial properties.

services.name: Fixture Installation
services.description: Sinks, toilets, faucets, showers — installed perfectly, caulked, and tested before we leave.

services.name: Backflow Prevention
services.description: Certified backflow testing and prevention device installation to protect your water supply.

testimonials.text: Mike came out within the hour and fixed our burst pipe fast. Honest pricing, no upsells. We'll never use anyone else.
testimonials.author: Jennifer R.

testimonials.text: Used Smith Plumbing for a full bathroom remodel. The crew was professional, clean, and finished ahead of schedule.
testimonials.author: Carlos M.

testimonials.text: Been using them for 8 years across 3 properties. They're simply the most reliable plumber in Austin.
testimonials.author: David K.
